name: Pogo's Quest Demo
description:
Take control of "Pogo" a "giant Bird-like Being" who must take on the "Mommlers" and restore order to his home-world. Pogo must jump, run, shoot and puzzle his way through each level to progress to the next.  

This is just a demo version that includes "Apple tree Land",  the first 2 levels of the game.

The game is a Re-Creation of a board game I made when I was about 8 - 10yrs old in the late 90s

          Default Controls:

          Jump: F,  X / Cross

          Attack: D,  X/ Square 

          Run: Shift, Right Shoulder Trigger 

          Shoot Weapon: S,  B / Circle

          Drop Weapon: A, Y / Triangle

          Interact: R, Right Shoulder Button

          Aim Bomb: E, Left Shoulder Trigger
